arabic_text: مَا قَدَرُواْ ٱللَّهَ حَقَّ قَدۡرِهِۦٓۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَقَوِيٌّ عَزِيزٌ
translation: (74) They have not appraised Allāh with true appraisal.[944] Indeed, Allāh is Powerful and Exalted in Might.
footnotes: [944]- They have not assessed Him with the assessment due to Him, meaning that they did not take into account His perfect attributes.
